metadata.title: Is the operating current value at reset the same as the current value at STOP mode?

sections.content:
Question:
Is the current flowing through VDD almost the same as in STOP mode when reset pin is fixed to low level?
Is the current flowing through VDD almost the same as in STOP mode when reset pin is fixed to low level?

Answer:
Yes, RL78 product has almost the same operating current as STOP mode. In addition, no through-current flows during reset.

Suitable Products
RL78 Family
